DOC.brief_title: Divalproex Sodium Treatment PTSD ( Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder )
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To study efficacy divalproex treatment PTSD . Research Design : This 8-week randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled treatment trial divalproex . Methodology : After sign informed consent meeting inclusion/exclusion criterion , patient randomize either divalproex placebo 8-week duration . During study pharmacist maintains randomization log administers placebo divalproex ( 500 mg/capsule ) look-a-like tablet . Patients ' symptom , side effect compliance assess bi-weekly . Based symptomology occurrence side effect , investigator increase medication 500 mg ( one tablet ) increments every four day , tolerate , maximum therapeutic benefit achieve , exceed 3000 mg/day ( 6 capsule ) . The dosing twice daily , high dose bedtime . Compliance assess bi-weekly pill count blind valproic acid level week 4 week 8 . Patients give supportive clinical management clinic visit . An investigator available telephone 24 hr day case emergency . Patients may see often need . Efficacy measure follow assessment scale : MADRS ( Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale ) , Ham-A ( Hamilton Anxiety Scale ) , CGI-s ( Clinical Global Impressions-Severity Illness Scale ) , CGI-I ( Clinical Global Impressions-Improvement Scale ) , GAF ( Global Assessment Functioning ) , CAPS ( Clinician-Administered PTSD Scale ) , TOP-8 ( Treatment Outcome PTSD Rating Scale ) , DTS ( Davidson Trauma Scale ) . Results study use evaluate efficacy divalproex treatment PTSD . Significance : Divalproex show promise treat PTSD open label trial . This study next step prove divalproex 's efficacy treatment PTSD .
